sqls.setAnnExist: update announcement set exist=1 where id='{id}'
sqls.setAnnFilename: update announcement set fileName='{fileName}' where id='{id}'
sqls.setAnnDownloadError: update announcement set exist=2 where id='{id}'
sqls.searchAnnouncement: select * from announcement where stockCode='{stockCode}' and ( fileName like '%{searchStr}%' or replace( replace(content , x'0A','') ,x'0D','') like '%{searchStr}%' )
sqls.noneContentAnn: select * from announcement where content is null or content = ''
sqls.batchExistAnn: select count(distinct id) as c from announcement where id in ({inStr})
sqls.annCountByStockCode: select count(distinct id) as c from Announcement where stockCode = '{stockCode}'
sqls.fileDisable: select dir || '\' || fileName as file,id from Announcement where stockCode = '{stockCode}'
sqls.equalFilename: select dir,fileName,COUNT(*) AS C from Announcement GROUP BY dir,fileName HAVING COUNT(*)>1
sqls.setAnnUnExist: update announcement set exist=0 where dir='{dir}' and fileName='{fileName}'
sqls.unParseAnn: select * from Announcement where content is null or content ='ERROR'
